channel.title: Hardest problem ever saw... Take a look if you dare!
channel.description:
My friends can't connect to my server.
What i do: I start the NO-IP aplication, run my server (without and problems) and tell them its ready.
When they try to connect it says "Error connecting to server"
What i 'm doing wrong? All my ports from my firewall are open.
Or can i let it work on a website?...
Please help me :)
Thx, by Mod Mopar

item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

actually cook, sebaleon is right, hamachi would solve the problem. it allows other users to connect without the owner of the server port forwarding. so mod mopar, go to www.hamachi.cc and download hamachi. if you have any problems, search around on the fourms, or ask.
